metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8685 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.8.3 and earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) external calendar url or (2) the bank name field in the "import external calendar" page.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
